divs: Sighting Detailsit was me and my father-in-law who is 70 yrs old we both were outside looking up towards the north sky and out of nowhere a saucer shaped craft materialized in front of us about 100ft above and about300yards away from us and flew very slowly allowing both of us to see it very clearly it flew towards the west and approached a low flying helicopter and the lighting was clear allowing us the best view possible if i had a camera it would have been the clearest photo ever printed it was that close then we wondered if the helicopter saw it and as the saucer was about 500 or so yards from the copter it just accelerated up over the copter and sort of just dissappeared before it reached the horizon, i didn't report it before as i didn't no where to report such a thing the is there are alot of sightings hereand we have a non-active air force base here named castle and as a kid i lived near the base and always saw unexplainable objects near or above the base airspace, now this happened about 5 yrs ago but the last two nights me my son and a friend all witnessed these strange star like objects that moved at unbelieveable speed there were two on the 9th 2 days ago and then last night we saw two more but this time they actully crossed paths like on a grid and one of them was much brighter than the other and after a couple of seconds the bright one dimmed to the brightness of the other and shot striaght up towards the moon and then we lost sight of them, this is my fist time reporting but be sure now that i've found mufon i will certainly report all promply. the suacer was incredible though , silver shiny big bright lights on bottom of craft turning counter clockwise with no sound or exaust that was visible. i am a artist and can clearly draw the thing we saw but do not know how to post on computer, a little computer illiterate, so sorry
